extendedInfo.description: dotFIT helps you and your family grow strong with evidence-based nutrition products and programs.Please log in using your dotFIT Member, Staff or Trainer account only.

reviews.title: Dear App Developers,
reviews.comment: This app could be SO much better. Ever heard of My Fitness Pal? Go check out their app. Now make this one more like that. I have to use this cuz it\'s linked w/ my gym & trainer, but I gotta tell ya. This app sucks. Can we at least get a frigging BARCODE SCANNER?
reviews.author: Katie Johnstone

reviews.title: Login doesn\'t work on mobile data connection
reviews.comment: The App can be made better 1. Login only works on wi-fi, it doesn\'t not work on mobile data network 2. the BMI calculation doesn\'t seem to work, even if you change the weight 3. food logging doesn\' t have the option to add custom foods. and many more..
reviews.author: Ramesh Sridharan

reviews.title: Help....
reviews.comment: So far i have downloaded the app. Now the app won\'t log me in. I have logged in 3 times via mobile browser and library computers but can\'t get this app to work on my MODed SGS3. Please help me fix this. My gym requires it yet if i can\'t get into it..........
reviews.author: Debra Bussing

reviews.title: Wrong math
reviews.comment: In addition to the other comments, this app does not compute calories properly. It seems to arbitrarily set your daily calorie lifestyle exertion merely enough to offset your exercise exertion.  Also, food entry is weak in comparison to MyFitnessPal. And I can\'t get exercise samples to show up unless I guess the name properly. I can\'t find or open a list of exercises. Sponsored by Crunch, such a shame. Crunch should just use MyFitnessPal with their trainers.
reviews.author: Jeff Reid

reviews.title: GS4 support?
reviews.comment: Just sits trying to maybe consider loading. Not actually logging in after sn & pw. Supposed to be checking in with my trainer on this app. So far gs4 health apps are whopping butt compared to this crappy app. Uninstalling in a week if I can\'t log in even once.
reviews.author: Anya Carter

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Won\'t even load the login info. Just sits and sits.  Back to jetfit
reviews.author: Tim Turner

reviews.title: Can\'t log in (edited)
reviews.comment: I try my username, my credentials are invalid. I try my email, it won\'t even load. I work as a Membership Adviser for Crunch Fitness and I\'m supposed to show my clients the convenience of this app. Please fix the issue. EDIT: Alright, now that it does work, I love it. Almost exactly like the website.
reviews.author: Krystal Cho

reviews.title: Updated
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app! The log in issue is now fixed and the program works great!  After I\'ve used this for a couple a weeks I think the only thing its lacking is a bar code scanner. Because there is no way to manually enter any food you eat. It does not somethings and I find myself having to enter it on the computer.
reviews.author: Stephine Brentson

reviews.title: App won\'t login
reviews.comment: Able to enter log in info, then app crashes. This needs to be fixed.
reviews.author: Carrie Sewell

reviews.title: Umff
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t let me log in it says i am not a valid user but i can log on through the Web just fine
reviews.author: Laura Camarillo

reviews.title: Needs coaching functions.
reviews.comment: Hopefully they will inplement a way for coaches to check on their clients through the app soon.
reviews.author: Joseph Wren
